channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Christmas trees dumped under bridge, 26th January
item.description:
These Christmas trees have been dumped here since early January and are taking over the pavement.

item.title: New pothole growing adjacent to the others - Loud Vibration, 26th January
item.description:
Amongst the potholes that are growing as the sun-surface fails causing our apartments to shake, there is a new pothole growing that makes a huge bang when buses pass by. It wakes us up in the night and is ruining our time at home. Please address the road resurfacing quickly.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 122, Forest Hill Road, Nunhead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
